nodes.text: Harval Tommick was a male who served as the chief of security for Five World Prime Minister Aidel Saxan as of 40 ABY. He was a political ally of Thrackan Sal-Solo.
When a group of twenty assassins was hired by Lumiya and Sal-Solo to eliminate Saxan and Admiral Gilad Pellaeon, Tommick died defending Saxan, who also died in the attack.
